title: Ignore UNKNOWN licenses on pull requests
description: Since a couple months VersionEye can check your dependencies on each pull request on GitHub. That was described here. VersionEye will mark the status of the pull request as failed if: a dependency has a 1 or more security vulnerabilities the license of a dependency violates the license whitelist the license of a dependency is …

title: New Feature: Inventory Diff
description: VersionEye has an open source inventory list for every organisation. That list simply shows all unique dependencies of an VersionEye organisation. The inventory list can be filtered down by different criteria of course. Now VersionEye can show you the difference between 2 inventory filters. On the new “inventory diff” page you can configure 2 different …
